p: Routine blood tests at admission revealed normal white blood cell count (6,500 μl) with 84% neutrophil and 9.9% lymphocyte, normal platelet count (146 × 10 3 μl), normal hemoglobin concentration, high levels of C‐reactive protein (PCR 134 mg/L), and slight increase of lactate dehydrogenase (LDH 372 U/L) normal levels of BNP (proBNP 43 pg/ml). The serum creatinine was 1.09 mg/dl and eGFR at 70 ml/min (Table 1).
